h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
h3_title: 7\. Not All Items Are What They Appear to Be
content: You absolutely want to spend time collecting all the items you encounter as you explore the regions. They’re essential for crafting valuable items like Medicines as well as Armor and Weapons. However, not all items are what they appear to be!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '7\. Not All Items Are What They Appear to Be'.
The content is as follows:
You absolutely want to spend time collecting all the items you encounter as you explore the regions. They’re essential for crafting valuable items like Medicines as well as Armor and Weapons. However, not all items are what they appear to be!
